website_summaries.verdict: Keep baby and toddler (under 18 months old) safe and secure with an easy-to-install car seat that's also easy on the wallet.
pros: Offers a built-in cup holder for drinks and snacks
Lightweight and not bulky, making it a great fit even in smaller vehicles and for air travel
Parents report their children nap well in the seat during car rides
cons: Some users complained that the padding is too thin

customer_reviews.title: am I glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two toddlers for a cross-country trip to Orlando and boy, am I glad I did! They were super lightweight and easy to tote around the airport. Our little ones were comfortable on the plane and that made the long trip so much easier for us all. Great purchase for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend this car seat for daily use
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend this car seat for daily use, but it is the perfect travel car seat. I was able to manage an umbrella stroller with my toddler in it, a diaper bag, a rolling carry on bag, and this car seat by myself in the airport. Worth every penny for making my travels easier!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good middle of the road carseat
customer_reviews.text: We are using this car seat in my husband's truck. My 22 month old only rides in it 1 or 2 times per week for short trips to the store or church. This is an inexpensive option for a second vehicle. In some ways it is easier to use than the more expensive seat in my suv. My son seems to like it, and it is a quality seat for the price. I would definitely recommend it for a second vehicle car seat used infrequently.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G

customer_reviews.title: Super light, great travel seat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our frequent travel in countries where car travel can be a bit chaotic and car seats are not standard, and we couldn’t be more pleased. It easy to install and very light to carry around. It may not have all the features of fancier models, but the ease of carrying it means we actually use it, which is much safer than non-seat alternatives. Also, I saw some negative reviews about comfort, but our little guy likes it just fine, and we’ve done multiple drives of 3+ hours, topping out with a 6-hour drive.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy extra car seats for my husbands vehicle and my mothers/ the grandma/ babysitter vehicle along with the one I had to have for my car. My toddler son falls asleep just fine and looks comfortable. There is not a lot of padding but he is never in the car long. He seems to enjoy the car ride in it. I was attracted to this item because of its affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Simple, smaller car seat
customer_reviews.text: I have an older 2 seat car without passenger air bag that I drive in the summer. It is equipped to put a child seat in the front passenger seat, but when I switched from the infant seat to the <65 lb seat, it obstructed a huge portion of my visibility. This seat sits much lower and doesn't obstruct my view. No, we won't be able to use it as long, but it's so much easier to use while rear facing than the bigger seat.

customer_reviews.title: Great for airline travel
customer_reviews.text: We bought this car seat specifically for airline travel for a trip to Europe. It was lightweight and the girls were comfortable and slept on the plane a few times for the 10 1/2 hour flight. They are accustomed to being strapped in, so all went well. Installing in and out of cabs and Ubers was simple and easy.
